Text: this appears to be FAKE, since the show won't broadcast until the end of November!

Think outside USA ;) 
German channel VOX showed it on October 20.
ok danberberberlee. YOU download almost 6 gigs of information in some bizarre format (.ts), and then post again and tell us.

Not a fake, and it plays fine in VLC.
But you'll have to speak German. There's a spoken German translation over everything said in English (except Michael's own interview segments, which merely feature subtitles). And Michael's amazing performance segments transcend language. 
So, a worthy and appreciated upload. Just wish I could turn off the German voiceover!

Thanx for it, but it's not good for me since it's not English or Spanish audio or subs.
MJ 4ever
Sorry, I'll wait for the original version without voiceovers
Hey guys, just so you know: this version is one hour longer then the one presented by ABC in the US!
